definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Père Pamphile had seen Dantès pass not ten minutes before;
sentences.chinese: 邦非尔老爹看见唐太斯在十分钟以前刚刚过去。

sentences.english: Today, my dad invited our very cute neighbor inside to introduce him to me.
sentences.chinese: 今天我老爹喜滋滋地把邻居帅哥带到家里介绍给我。

sentences.english: Doggies often follow daddy to Ho-Huan mountain.
sentences.chinese: 狗狗们常常跟老爹上合欢山练车。

sentences.english: He shrank back, tightly with the money in the pocket.
sentences.chinese: 老爹朝后退着，紧紧护着口袋里的钱。

sentences.english: My daddy once used his bear hand catched a bullet.
sentences.chinese: 我的老爹一次用他的熊掌抓住了一颗子弹。

sentences.english: Seeing Wang on the mound on Tuesday, then, was a best-case scenario for manager Joe Torre.
sentences.chinese: 星期二看到阿民在投手丘上，这是老爹最想看到的。

sentences.english: Please contact us first for housing reservation by mobile phone before everyday 8 PM.
sentences.chinese: 欲住宿请于晚上八点前以手机联络徐老爹。

sentences.english: Dad, i don't want to loose my toes !
sentences.chinese: 老爹，我可不想少几个脚指头。

sentences.english: The world's most embarrassing father is no more.
sentences.chinese: 他算得上世界上最雷人的老爹了。

sentences.english: Their dad, Gregg, a well-known figure in the American homeschool movement, delivered one.
sentences.chinese: 他们的老爹格力，一位美国家庭教育运动的著名人物。

sentences.english: Julien became friends with Sophie, the price is beaten by dad.
sentences.chinese: 于连跟苏菲成了朋友，代价是被老爹暴打。

sentences.english: Zhao Lao Die is said by her one Leng, don't know a daughter where the reassurance for coming.
sentences.chinese: 赵老爹被她说得一愣，不知道女儿哪里来的信心。

sentences.english: Ennis sat at the kitchen table with Jack's father.
sentences.chinese: 埃尼斯和杰克的老爹坐在厨房的餐桌旁。

sentences.english: In order to bury my father, I have to sell myself.
sentences.chinese: 为求葬老爹，唯有卖身为奴自作贱。

sentences.english: They talked with each other, and try to guess the purpose of each other.
sentences.chinese: 梁山伯与老爹互相试探，彼此猜测着对方的意图。

definition: (coll.) old man/(said of an aging husband) my old man
my (you etc) old father/polite appellation for an elderly male
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
